description: Default label for new notification. I.e.: Notification 1, Notification 2...
Selecting this event will trigger notification upon any workspace activity
Selecting this event will trigger notification whenever an item status is changed
Error message when the setting did not save correctly
Success message when the setting was updated
Text field label for the incoming webhook address
Error message when the user did not provide the slack webhook address
defaultMessage: Please add the Slack webhook address

description: Button to create a new notification
Text field label for the name of the notification
Header to event selector. E.g.: If 'Item is added to' ...
Error message to tell the user they need to select a notification condition
defaultMessage: Please select a condition to send notifications

description: Header to notification destination input. E.g.: Then send notification to '#general'
Text field label for the slack channel name
Error message to tell the user they need to provide a slack channel name to send notifications to
defaultMessage: Please add the Slack channel where notifications will be sent
